Quests.Name: bert_honey
Quests.Title: Un marido en pánico
Quests.Description: Olga ha tenido cambios de humor y ha estado deseando miel. Bert entra en pánico por encontrar miel para calmar a su esposa.
Quests.ReactionText: ¡La trajiste! ¡Muchas gracias! ¡Espero que esto haga feliz a mi esposa!$h

Quests.Name: trinnie_sunflower
Quests.Title: La princesa girasol
Quests.Description: ¡Trinnie necesita girasoles para el vestido que está tratando de hacer para convertirse en la Princesa Girasol!
Quests.ReactionText: ¡¡Las flores están aquí!! ¡¡Estoy tan feliz!! ¡¡Muchas gracias @!!$h

Quests.Name: keahi_slime
Quests.Title: El conocedor de babas
Quests.Description: Keahi quiere recolectar babas como un nuevo pasatiempo. Ha ahorrado suficiente dinero para pagar por babas.
Quests.ReactionText: Estas son algunas de las cualidades que tienes. Son mías ahora. ¡Estoy agradecido por tu servicio! ¡Recogeré más ahora!$4

Quests.Name: yuuma_ring
Quests.Title: Anillo perdido de Yuuma
Quests.Description: Yuuma perdió su anillo. Recordó que la última vez que todavía lo usaba fué cuando estaba comprando cosas en la granja de Jeric.
Quests.Objective: Encuentra el anillo de Yuuma y devuélveselo.
Quests.ReactionText: ¿¡Lo encontraste!? ¡Muchas gracias @! ¡Estoy muy agradecido!$h

Quests.Name: olga_tuna
Quests.Title: El antojo de mariscos de Liden
Quests.Description: Los Liden anhelan comer atún. Te han pedido que les lleves uno. Entregale el atún a Olga y ella te pagará.
Quests.ReactionText: ¡Oye, lo has conseguido! ¡Y está fresco! ¡Gran trabajo @!$h

Quests.Name: lenny_harvest
Quests.Title: El desafío de Lenny
Quests.Description: Lenny te ha desafiado a cosechar 30 chirivías. Si logras hacerlo, ella te dará una recompensa.

Quests.Name: aguar_essence
Quests.Title: Esencia esencial para el científico
Quests.Description: El Sr. Aguar requiere algo de esencia sombría para su experimento.
Quests.Objective: Entrega 10 esencias Sombrías al Sr. Aguar
Quests.ReactionText: Maravilloso trabajo @. Aquí está tu pago. Ahora si me disculpas...

Quests.Name: freddie_sword
Quests.Title: Un viejo amigo perdido
Quests.Description: Freddie perdió una vieja espada suya mientras paseaba por el pueblo. Dijo que recuerda haber estado al lado de una cascada por última vez.
Quests.Objective: Encuentra la espada de Freddie y devuélvesela
Quests.ReactionText: ¿¡La encontraste!? ¡Muchas gracias @! ¡Estoy muy agradecido!$h

Quests.Name: ezekiel_harvest
Quests.Title: El desafío cursi de Ezequiel
Quests.Description: Ezekiel te ha desafiado a cosechar 60 maíz. Si consigues hacerlo, te dará una recompensa.

Quests.Name: pika_mayonnaise
Quests.Title: ¡El ingrediente que falta!
Quests.Description: Pika cree que necesita mayonesa para su nueva receta y te ha pedido que le des una.
Quests.ReactionText: ¡Mahalo @! ¡Esto también es de buena calidad! ¡Aquí está el pago prometido!$h

Quests.Name: richard_glasses
Quests.Title: Misplaced Glasses
Quests.Description: Richard misplaced his glasses!. The only thing he remembers is that he didn't leave the hotel the whole day.
Quests.Objective: Find Richard's glasses and return it to him.
Quests.ReactionText: ¿¡La encontraste!? ¡Muchas gracias @! ¡Estoy muy agradecido!$h

Quests.Name: aguar_gem
Quests.Title: Aquamarine Search
Quests.Description:
I am in need of some Aquamarine. I'll be sure to pay you plenty if you provide me with what I desire.
        -Mr. Aguar.

- 1000g on Delivery
- Mr. Aguar will be thankful
Quests.Objective: Deliver an Aquamarine to Mr. Aguar
Quests.ReactionText: This would do, Here's the payment. Now if you'll excuse me.

Quests.Name: aguar_fairystone
Quests.Title: Fairystone Search
Quests.Description:
I am in need of some Fairystone. I'll be sure to pay you plenty if you provide me with what I desire.
        -Mr. Aguar.

- 3000g on Delivery
- Mr. Aguar will be thankful
Quests.Objective: Deliver a Fairystone to Mr. Aguar
Quests.ReactionText: This would do, Here's the payment. Now if you'll excuse me.

Quests.Name: bert_gold
Quests.Title: A Golden Opportunity
Quests.Description:
I think the valley needs more gold in it? Don't you think? I'll be sure to reward anyone who smelts 10 Gold Bars.
        -Bert.

- 500 on Completion
- Bert will be thankful

Quests.Name: bert_banana
Quests.Title: Bananas and Bert
Quests.Description:
I think I want to start a Banana Juice business! I'll surely be thankful to anyone who supplies me with them bananas, maybe atleast 5 of 'em!
        -Bert.

- 2000g on Delivery
- Bert will be thankful
Quests.ReactionText: These are great! Thanks a bunch @!

Quests.Name: ezekiel_cavecarrot
Quests.Title: A Nostalgic Taste
Quests.Description:
It's been so long since I tasted a Cave Carrot. If anyone brings me some I'll exchange something for it.
        -Ezekiel.

- 250g on Delivery
- Ezekiel will be thankful
Quests.Objective: Deliver a Cave Carrot to Ezekiel
Quests.ReactionText: This looks delicious! Here's the payment..

Quests.Name: ezekiel_quartz
Quests.Title: Tough Miner
Quests.Description:
If anyone can mine 20 Quartz in 3 days I'll start to respect them.
        -Ezekiel.

- 5000g on Completion
- Ezekiel will respect you a bit more

Quests.Name: freddie_shadowbrute
Quests.Title: An Old Routine
Quests.Description:
I want to pass down my old warm up routine to any young adventurer out there. Slay some shadowbrutes to warm up the muscles before going to serious missions! That's your challenge.
        -Freddie.

- 5000g on Completion

Quests.Name: freddie_pepperrex
Quests.Title: A Wonderful Hobby
Quests.Description:
Has anyone heard of Pepper Rexes? They're quite fun to hunt! I challenge anyone to slay a number of them and I'll be sure to reward you. Goodluck!.
        -Freddie.

- 5000g on Completion

Quests.Name: keahi_tomato
Quests.Title: A New Masterpiece
Quests.Description:
Can anyone bring me a big fat juicy tomato? It's for a secret project.
        -Keahi.

- 500g on Delivery
- Keahi will be thankful
- Keahi will spare you
Quests.ReactionText: A! It's perfect @! This is going to be epic!$h

Quests.Name: keahi_bomb
Quests.Title: A Harmless Prank
Quests.Description:
So my dad won't buy me a bomb. So I posted this instead! If anyone has one, bring one to me and I'll pay you with my savings! Quick! Before they remove this again!.
        -Keahi.

- 1000g on Delivery
- Keahi will be thankful
- Citizens will be concerned
Quests.ReactionText: No one saw you right? Awesome! See ya @! Thanks again!$h

Quests.Name: lenny_eggplant
Quests.Title: Quick Grocery
Quests.Description:
I saw this intriguing recipe for a salad and it requires some eggplants. I'll pay anyone who delivers me some.
        -Lenny.

- 500g on Delivery
- Lenny will be thankful
Quests.ReactionText: It's finally here! Thanks a lot @! I'll be sure to have a fantastic dinner tonight!$h

Quests.Name: lenny_wine
Quests.Title: Stress Reliever
Quests.Description:
Can anyone bring me some wine? I've been wanting to take a de-stress night and I'm sure it will be perfect with some wine in it.
        -Lenny.

- -1000g on Delivery
- Lenny will be thankful
Quests.ReactionText: Ah! I've been longing for this! Thank you @.

Quests.Name: lola_hauntedskull
Quests.Title: Best of the Best
Quests.Description:
Anyone up for some challenge? I'll pay you handsomely if you manage to slay 20 Haunted Skulls. I don't want any crybabies now.
        -Lola.

- 7000g on Completion

Quests.Name: lola_bigslime
Quests.Title: Slime Armageddon
Quests.Description:
I've been spotting some slimes almost everywhere. To exterminate them one must start with the big ones. If only I was as young as before I can do this myself. I'll pay anyone who slays some Big Slimes.
        -Lola.

- 3000g on Completion

Quests.Name: olga_coffee
Quests.Title: To Try A New Drink
Quests.Description:
I think I might try some coffee. I'm getting a bit sick of tea. I'll pay anyone who brings me some.
        -Olga.

- 600g on Delivery
- Olga will be thankful
Quests.ReactionText: Thank you @, I hope this is worth it!

Quests.Name: olga_melonharvest
Quests.Title: The Melon Test
Quests.Description:
I'm curious to know if Melons are a good investment. So I'm willing to pay anyone who plants and harvests a number of melons.
        -Olga.

- 2000g on Completion
- Olga will be thankful

Quests.Name: pika_cheese
Quests.Title: Cheesy Memory
Quests.Description:
I need some cheese to make a childhood dish of mine. I want to my son to taste the dish that made me passionate about cooking.
        -Pika.

- 700g on Delivery
- Pika will be thankful
Quests.ReactionText: Mahalo! Thank You! I can't wait to start cooking!$h

Quests.Name: pika_starfruit
Quests.Title: A Homeland Specialty
Quests.Description:
I've been missing a certain Ginger Island dish for quite some time now. I need some Starfruits though, if anyone can bring me one I'll be really thankful.
        -Pika.

- 1000g on Delivery
- Pika will be thankful
Quests.ReactionText: Mahalo! I've been looking everywhere for these! Thank you once again @!$h.

Quests.Name: richard_caviar
Quests.Title: An Expensive Cuisine
Quests.Description:
I'm planning to add some more dishes in the room service menu for the hotel. One said dish requires some Caviar. I'll be sure to pay the delivery handsomely.
        -Richard.

- 8000g on Delivery
- Richard will be thankful
Quests.ReactionText: This is some good quality caviar @! I'm utmost grateful.$h

Quests.Name: richard_bat
Quests.Title: Hotel Transalvania
Quests.Description:
Bats have been pestering around the hotel at night lately! They're stinking up the place! I need someone to slay a number of them in the mines so they stop coming.
        -Richard.

- 5000g on Delivery
- Richard will be thankful

Quests.Name: trinnie_pinkcake
Quests.Title: Pink Dream
Quests.Description:
So I had this dream last night where I was living in a HUGE castle, it was made of cake, and it was PINK! And so then I woke up and now I want to eat Pink Cake <. Papa gave me money to pay for the delivery yey!
        -Trinnie.

- 3000g on Delivery
- Trinnie will be thankful
Quests.ReactionText: Yey! It's here! Thank you so much @! Here's the payment daddy said I should give you!$h

Quests.Name: trinnie_poppy
Quests.Title: Poppy Drawing
Quests.Description:
I need a Poppy flower! I'm having a hard time drawing one! Someone PLEASE bring me one! Thank you! <.
        -Trinnie.

- 100g on Delivery
- Trinnie will be thankful
Quests.ReactionText: Oohh! I looks pretty! Thank you @! I'll start drawing later.$h

Quests.Name: yuuma_burger
Quests.Title: A Kid's Wish
Quests.Description:
It's fine if no one accepts this. But if anyone can, I just want to taste a Survival Burger again, It's been so long since I had one. But yeah, It's no big deal. Thank you.
        -Yuuma.

- 500g on Delivery
- Yuuma will be thankful
Quests.Objective: Deliver a Survival Burger to Yuuma
Quests.ReactionText: I've been wanting this for so long! Thank you so much @!$h

Quests.Name: yuuma_iron
Quests.Title: Fix the Broken Swing
Quests.Description:
Shiro wants to fix the swing in front of the house but I won't let him. So I'll do it instead, but I need some Iron Bars. Can anyone bring me some? I'll pay I promise. Thank you.
        -Yuuma.

- 1500g on Delivery
- Yuuma will be thankful
Quests.ReactionText: Thank you for these @, I'm glad I put up that notice, I was a little scared to go into the mines to get them myself.

Quests.Name: mysticfalls_1
Quests.Title: The Falls of Companionship
Quests.Description: Hints of an underground waterfall can be found in the Ridge Forest. It's rummored to bless the ones who value friendship.
Quests.Objective: Find the hidden waterfalls with lush green foliage in the Ridge Forest

Quests.Name: mysticfalls_2
Quests.Title: The Falls of Love
Quests.Description: Hints of an underground waterfall can be found in the Ridge Forest. It's rummored to bless the ones who value love.
Quests.Objective: Find the hidden waterfalls surrounded by pink trees and sand in the Ridge Forest
Quests.RewardDescription: Affection from the bachelors and bachelorettes of the valley

Quests.Name: mysticfalls_3
Quests.Title: The Falls of Sacrifice
Quests.Description: Hints of an underground waterfall can be found in the Ridge Forest. It's rummored to bless the ones who are curious about the unseen.
Quests.Objective: Find the hidden waterfalls surrounded by the dark in the Ridge Forest

Quests.Name: lenny_minecart1
Quests.Title: Ridge Minecart Restoration!
Quests.Description: Lenny has given you details of materials needed to fix the minecart.
Quests.ReactionText: These would be enough @! Great job! Now here's the next list of materials.

Quests.Name: lenny_minecart2
Quests.Title: Ridge Minecart Restoration!
Quests.Description: Lenny has given you details of the next material needed to fix the minecart.
Quests.ReactionText: Woah! You got them! We're getting close! Okay, here's the last thing we need...

Quests.Name: lenny_minecart3
Quests.Title: Ridge Minecart Restoration!
Quests.Description: Lenny has given you details of the last material needed to fix the minecart.
Quests.ReactionText: Awesome! We can finally finish it! Thank you so much for the hardwork @! Come back here tomorrow and see the finished minecart system okay?$h

OfferDetails.Text: Hola @,^Soy Trinnie la que está escribiendo, solo quiero preguntar si me podrías dar algunos girasoles cuando puedas. Los quiero porque quiero convertirme en la princesa de los girasoles, porque escuché decir a Keahi que los girasoles son bonitos y una princesa de girasoles sería aún más bonita. Así que tal vez me haga un vestido de princesa con girasoles.^¡Papá dijo que te pagará! ¡Gracias @!^     - Trinnie

OfferDetails.DialogueText: ¡Oye @! Vas a las minas, ¿verdad? ¿Luchas contra babas y esas cosas?#$b#Si por casualidad tienes algunas baba, ¿puedes dármelas?$h#$b#¡Creo que empezaré un nuevo pasatiempo como coleccionista de babas!$h#$b#¡Además, puedo gastar muchas bromas!$h#$b#¿Me puedes traer algunas? ¡¡Gracias!!$h

Uhhmm... ¿¿Ey @?? ¿Puedo pedirte que me ayudes?$s#$b#Perdí mi anillo... Un anillo que mi mamá me dió hace mucho tiempo...$s#$b#No puedo encontrarlo... Esperaba que me ayudases... $s#$b#¡Te pagaré la molestia, te lo prometo! No puedo dejar a Shiro solo mientras lo busco.$s#$b#Por favor, búscalo @...$s

OfferDetails.Text: Hola @,^Me gustaría un atún. Mi familia ha estado deseando un plato de atún desde hace bastante tiempo y queremos uno tuyo, @. También hemos preparado el pago por la entrega y sin duda te lo agradeceríamos. Esperamos saber de ti pronto!^^    - Olga Liden

¡Hola @!^¡Bienvenido al valle! Mira, tengo un desafío para ti, nuevo granjero. ¿Estás preparado para ello?^Te desafío a que coseches 30 chirivías. Cuando lo hagas, te recompensaré, ¿de acuerdo? ¡Sin presión! Asegúrate de divertirte, ¿de acuerdo?^^- Lenny

@, ^Necesito tu ayuda para recolectar alguna esencia sombría para mi próxima investigación. No tengo experiencia en combate y por eso necesito confiártelo a ti. Espero tu entrega. Por supuesto, habrá pago.^^- Sr. Aguar, RSVWRF

OfferDetails.DialogueText: Ahora no puedo recordar dónde estaba...$s#$b#Oh, hola, jóven. Lamento haber estado pensando en mi espada.$s#$b#Estaba paseando por el pueblo el otro día y parece que la perdí.$s#$b#Lo último que recuerdo es que estaba cerca de una cascada, pero no recuerdo cuál.$s#$b#Oh, espero que nadie salga lastimado cuando la encuentren, es bastante afilada.$s#$b#Si alguna vez la encuentras @, te pagaré cuando me la devuelvas.$s

OfferDetails.Text: Bienvenido a la temporada de verano, granjero.^Mira, tengo un pequeño desafío para ti. No te preocupes, te pagaré cuando lo termines. SI lo terminas^Cosecha 60 maíz y quedaré impresionado.^^- Ezekiel

¡Aloha @ !,^He estado pensando en una receta para un nuevo plato y he estado tratando de encontrar una mayonesa decente para acompañarlo. Verás, ¡la mayonesa será el ingrediente secreto! Esperaba que me pudieras dar una de las tuyas. Te pagaré la mayonesa más el envío, no te preocupes.^^- Pika

OfferDetails.DialogueText: Ahem, Hello @, I need a favor if that's fine by you.#$b#I may have seem to have misplaced my glasses and it's a bit hard for me to find it well because, yes I can't see very well.#$b#All I know is I didn't leave the hotel before I lost it. I'll pay you for the trouble as well.

OfferDetails.Text: Dear @,^For the restoration of the minecart at the ridge, We first need 50 pieces of Wood. You can hand them over to me whenever you have them all ready.^^- Lenny
